title: How Joann Fabrics went from a cult-favorite retail darling to a bankruptcy disaster
description: Generational spending shifts, a leveraged buyout, and a post-pandemic whiff have all contributed to the death of a beloved American institution.
author: Lila MacLellan
excerpt: Generational spending shifts, a leveraged buyout, and a post-pandemic whiff have all contributed to the death of a beloved American institution.
